pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau Speaks with Taoiseach of Ireland Leo Varadkar | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke yesterday to Irish Taoiseach Leo Varadkar. The Prime Minister conveyed his congratulations for the passage of Irelandâ€™s referendum which advanced women's reproductive rights and a woman's right to choose.  The leaders agreed that this was a critical step forward in the rights of women.
